categorytranslation.label: Distancia hasta la estación de tren
Service de navette de / vers l'aéroport
Servicio de enlace desde / al aeropuerto
Capacité de la plus grande salle

trcitemdetail.longdescription:
NH Barbizon Palace features 269 rooms, including 1 royal suite, 2 suites and 4 junior suites.
All rooms provide all the comforts you would expect from a five-star hotel, including wireless internet.

One of the celebrated features of NH Barbizon Palace is the restored 15th-century St. Olofs Chapel, which now serves as a unique conference centre. The imposing, eighteen-meter high chapel has a unique ambiance and provides the ideal conference setting.

NH Barbizon Palace offers conference facilities for groups to 400 people. The monumental Boardroom and the exclusive Henry Hudson Rooms are perfectly suited for high-level meetings. The Prins Hendrik Rooms and the St. Olofs Chapel can also accommodate larger functions.
trcitemdetail.shortdescription: NH Barbizon Palace is located in Amsterdam's historical centre. Behind the authentic 17th-century façade, a delightful sense of history flows through the hotel.
trcitemdetail.title: NH Collection Barbizon Palace
